description: Bring a bit of Southwestern art to the trails with these Hike Light Cushion Southwest Tile Print Crew Socks. Feel all-day comfort in this one-of-a-kind design by Vernan Kee, in collaboration with Natives Outdoors to empower Indigenous communities. With breathability, durability, and a performance-ready fit, this sock has everything you need to hike every region you’ve got your eyes on.
name: Smartwool Hike Light Cushion Southwest Tile Print Crew Socks - Mens

specs.value: 57% Merino Wool, 12% Nylon, 27% Recycled Nylon, 3% Elastane, 1% Polyester
